title: Emerald Bloom Vanki Bangle - A Touch of Tradition with Modern Sparkle
materials: Cubic Zirconia (CZ) accents. Features Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: Intricate filigree design inspired by traditional Vanki patterns. The central emerald is bezel-set and surrounded by a halo of sparkling Cubic Zirconia. The openwork design allows for maximum light reflection, enhancing the brilliance. Features a secure hinged closure for comfortable wear.
colors: Rich gold tone complemented by the vibrant green of the emerald and the dazzling white of the CZ stones.
occasions: Sankranthi) or any special occasion where you want to add a touch of traditional elegance to your attire. Also suitable for cocktail parties and modern celebrations.
description: This exquisite Vanki bangle seamlessly blends traditional South Indian design with modern aesthetics. The high-quality 22K gold and sparkling gemstones ensure a timeless piece that will be cherished for generations. The vibrant emerald adds a touch of regal sophistication, while the intricate filigree work reflects the skill of our master craftsmen. The secure and comfortable design makes it ideal for all-day wear.
